articles.title: Solar Eclipse: Anticipation grows as millions hope for clear skies - BBC.com
articles.description: Millions are hoping for good weather to view the first eclipse this century to cross all three North American countries.

articles.author: Kate Sullivan, Kristen Holmes
articles.title: Trump says abortion legislation should be left to states - CNN
articles.description: Former President Donald Trump said Monday that abortion rights should be left to the states, offering his clearest stance yet on one of the most delicate and contentious issues in American politics.
articles.content: Former President Donald Trump said Monday that abortion rights should be left to the states, offering his clearest stance yet on one of the most delicate and contentious issues in American politics.… [+2288 chars]

articles.author: Katie Lobosco
articles.title: Biden races to enact new student loan forgiveness plan ahead of November - CNN
articles.description: Biden administration officials on Monday unveiled the details of a new plan to forgive student loan debt, suggesting that millions of Americans could start seeing debt relief as soon as this fall.
articles.content:
